actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 8474) entitled "A bill for the relief of J. Clarence Ingram, Don W. Ingram, and Dick L. Ingram of Nephi, Utah" to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 8474, entitled "A bill for the relief of J. Clarence Ingram, Don W. Ingram, and Dick L. Ingram of Nephi, Utah," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 8474) entitled "A bill for the relief of J. Clarence Ingram, Don W. Ingram, and Dick L. Ingram of Nephi, Utah" to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.
